settings.heading: Professional Brow Care for Salons & Artists
settings.subheading: Offer your clients the complete brow care system they'll want to take home
settings.description: IS Beauty Lux provides gentle, professional-grade products that deliver consistent results for both you and your clients. Join hundreds of beauty professionals who trust IS Beauty Lux to elevate their brow services and increase retail revenue.

settings.heading: Boost Your Bottom Line
settings.text: Our high-quality duo system encourages client purchases with an average retail value of $34.99 per sale. Professional-grade products your clients actually want to buy and use at home.

settings.heading: Safe for All Clients
settings.text: pH-balanced and dermatologist-tested for sensitive eye areas. Perfect for clients with lash extensions, sensitive skin, or those seeking clean beauty options. Reduces service complications and client complaints.

settings.heading: Easy to Incorporate
settings.text: Our 3-step system fits seamlessly into existing brow services. Use during prep and finishing to enhance results, then retail the complete system for at-home maintenance.

settings.heading: Step 1: Apply to Your Services
settings.text: Contact us to set up your professional account and receive wholesale pricing. Minimum opening order applies.

settings.heading: Step 2: Verify Your Credentials
settings.text: Submit your business license, cosmetology license, or salon credentials for verification. Most applications approved within 24-48 hours.

settings.heading: Step 3: Order & Grow
settings.text: Place your first order and begin offering IS Beauty Lux to clients. Ongoing support and marketing materials provided.

settings.heading: What are the minimum order requirements?
settings.text: Our starter tier begins at 6 units of The Duo, with individual products available in quantities of 12+. This ensures you have adequate inventory to begin retailing while maintaining wholesale pricing.

settings.heading: Do you offer training or marketing support?
settings.text: Yes! All professional accounts receive product education materials, suggested retail techniques, and branded marketing assets. Growth and Professional tier accounts receive additional support including staff training resources.

settings.heading: What is your return policy for professionals?
settings.text: We offer a 30-day return policy on unopened products in original condition. Damaged shipments are replaced immediately. We stand behind our products and your success.

settings.heading: How quickly can I get approved and start ordering?
settings.text: Most professional applications are approved within 24-48 hours of receiving complete documentation. Once approved, orders typically ship within 2-3 business days via ground shipping.
